1546 typedef struct RAIL_CsmaConfig {
1550  uint8_t csmaMinBoExp;
1554  uint8_t csmaMaxBoExp;
1560  uint8_t csmaTries;
1565  int8_t ccaThreshold;
1573  uint16_t ccaBackoff;
1577  uint16_t ccaDuration;
1583  uint32_t csmaTimeout;
1584 } RAIL_CsmaConfig_t;
1585 
1591 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_802_15_4_2003_2p4_GHz_OQPSK_CSMA { \
1592  /* CSMA per 802.15.4-2003 on 2.4 GHz OSPSK, commonly used by ZigBee */ \
1593  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 3, /* 2^3-1 for 0..7 backoffs on 1st try */ \
1594  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 5, /* 2^5-1 for 0..31 backoffs on 3rd+ tries */ \
1595  /* csmaTries */ 5, /* 5 tries overall (4 re-tries) */ \
1596  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* 10 dB above sensitivity */ \
1597  /* ccaBackoff */ 320, /* 20 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
1598  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* 8 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
1599  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
1600 }
1601 
1609 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_SINGLE_CCA { \
1610  /* Perform a single CCA after 'fixed' delay */ \
1611  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
1612  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
1613  /* csmaTries */ 1, /* Single try */ \
1614  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* Override if not desired choice */ \
1615  /* ccaBackoff */ 0, /* No backoff (override with fixed value) */ \
1616  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* Override if not desired length */ \
1617  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
1618 }
1619 
1624 typedef struct RAIL_LbtConfig {
1628  uint8_t lbtMinBoRand;
1632  uint8_t lbtMaxBoRand;
1638  uint8_t lbtTries;
1643  int8_t lbtThreshold;
1651  uint16_t lbtBackoff;
1655  uint16_t lbtDuration;
1663  uint32_t lbtTimeout;
1664 } RAIL_LbtConfig_t;
1665 
1673 #define RAIL_LBT_CONFIG_ETSI_EN_300_220_1_V2_4_1 { \
1674  /* LBT per ETSI 300 220-1 V2.4.1 */ \
1675  /* LBT time = random backoff of 0-5ms in .5ms increments plus 5ms fixed */ \
1676  /* lbtMinBoRand */ 0, /* */ \
1677  /* lbtMaxBoRand */ 10, /* */ \
1678  /* lbtTries */ RAIL_MAX_LBT_TRIES, /* the maximum supported */ \
1679  /* lbtThreshold */ -87, /* */ \
1680  /* lbtBackoff */ 500, /* 0.5 ms */ \
1681  /* lbtDuration */ 5000, /* 5 ms */ \
1682  /* lbtTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout (recommend user override) */ \
1683 }
